Translations.Text: hananim-ui myeonglyeong-i gakkaoni seodulleo guhaji malgeos-imyeo geubun-eul yeong gwangdoege hago geubun-eul daejeoghaneun mo deungeos wie issge hala hasigo

cheonsadeul-eul tonghayeo geubun-i wonhasineun seonjijadeul-ege myeonglyeong-ui malsseum eul bonaesa na oeeneun sin-i eobsda neun geos-eul gyeong-gohago naleul gyeong-oehala neun malsseum-i iss-eossdeola
geubunkkeseo jinlilo cheonjileul changjo hasyeoss-euni geubunman-i geudeul-i biyuha neun modeungeos wie gyesinola
ingan-eul hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo chang johasyeoss-eumae bola ajigdo geuneun non jaenghago issdeola
neohuileul wihae gachugdeul-eul changjo hasyeoss-euni geu an-eneun ongiga iss-eo yuyonghamyeo ttohan geugeos-eulo il-yonghal yangsig-eul seobchwihadoda
neohuiga geu gachugdeul-eul jib-eulo delyeool ttaewa mogjang-eulo annaehaneun geu an-eneun neohuileul wihan aleumdaum i iss-eumyeo
neohuiga sugo eobs-ineun meon jiyeog kkaji unbanhal su eobsneun mugeoun jim-eul gachugdeul-i unbanhayeo junani sillo junim-eun salang-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
maldeul-imyeo nosaedeul-imyeo dangnagwi deul-eul dueo neohuiga seungchahago jangsig hadolog hayeoss-eumyeo ttohan hananim-eun neohuiga alji moshaneun geosdo changjoha sinola
hananimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-i iss-eu doe eotteon gil-eun goleuji moshan gildo issnani geuleona geubun-i wonhasindamyeon neohuideul moduleul indohasyeoss-eulila
geubunkkeseo haneullobuteo bileul naelige hasa geujung-ui ilbuleul neohui ui eumlyosulo hasyeossgo geujung-ui ilbu neun gachug-i meog-eul sigmul-eul wihaeseo du syeossnola

geubun-eun geugeos eulo hayeo neohuileul wihae gogsiggwa ollibeuwa jonglyeona mu yeolmaewa podowa modeun jonglyuui yeol maeleul saengsanhasini sillo geu an-eneun baegseong-i suggohaeyahal yejeung-i issnola
geubun-eun bamgwa naj-eul neohuileul wihae gyochahage hasa taeyang-gwa dalgwa byeoldeul-i geubun-ui myeonglyeong-e bogjongke ha ni sillo geu an-eneun baegseong-i al-aya hal yejeung-i issnola
daejiwie changjohan modeun geosdeul eul yeoleo saegkkallo hayeo neohuiege yuyongke hayeoss-euni sillo geu an-eneun baegseong-i yeom-wonhaeya hal gyohun-i issno la

geubunkkeseo badaleul dusimae neo huiga geulohayeo sinseonhan saengseon-eul meog dolog hasyeossgo geulobuteo neohuiga geol chil jangsigpum-eul eoddolog hayeoss-eumyeo pa doleul ilgo ganeun baeleul neohuiga bo lini ineun neohuiga geubun-ui eunhyeleul gang-guhadolog ham-ila neohuineun gamsaha ge doelila
geubun-eun sandeul-eul daeji wie gojeongsikisyeoss-euni ineun neohuileul anjeong ke hagoja ham-iyo tto geu wie gang gwa gil-eul dusyeoss-eumae ilo neohuiga seuseuloleul indohadolog ham-ila
ijeongpyowa byeoldeullosseo salamdeul i banghyang-eul al su issnola
icheoleom changjohasineun geubun-eul changjohal su eobsneun geosgwa biyuhaneunyo neohuiga kkaedadji mosham-ila
neohuiga hananim-ui eunhyeleul gyesanhanda haedo neohuineun geugeos-eul hea lil su eobs-euni sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
hananim-eun neohuiga gamchuneun geosgwa bakk-eulo natanaeneun modeun geosdo algo gyesinani
hananim oee geudeul-i sungbaeha neun geosdeul-eun amu geosdo changjohal su eobsneun pijomuldeullo
geudeul-eun saengmyeong-i eobsneun jug-eun geosdeullo geudeul-i eonje buhwaldoellyeonji mo leunila
neohuiui sin-eun hollo gyesin hananim-ila geuleona naeseleul midji ani han jadeul-eun geudeul-ui ma-eum-i saagha yeo omanham-eul peoudeola
hananim-eun geudeul-i sumgineun geos gwa bakk-eulo natanaeneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesimae omanhan jadeul-eul salangha ji ani hasinola
geudeul-ege neohui junim-i mueos eul gyesihaessneunyo lago mul-euni yesnal uhwadeul-ila malhayeossdeola
geudeullo hayeogeum simpan-ui nal geudeul-ui joeaggwa geudeul-i mujihayeo bang hwangke han joeag-eul jilm-eojidolog hali ni geudeul-i jilm-eojil geugeos-e jeojuga iss-eulila

geudeul ijeon-ui joeindeuldo eummo hayeoss-eumae hananimkkeseo geudeul jibdeul-uijijuleul muneotteulisa jibung-i geudeul wieseo muneojideola ileohge hayeo beol-eun geudeul-i insighaji moshaneun gos eseo dolaehanila

simpan-ui nal-i doemae hananimkke seo geudeul-eul suchiseuleobge hamyeo ileu sideola neohuiga nonjaenghadeon naui dong banjadeul-i eodie issneunyo lago ha sini hagjadeul-i sillo inal chiyoggwa jeojuneun bulsinjadeul wie iss-eulila malhadeola

geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a cheonsadeul-i geu saengmyeong-eul geodueo gal ttaegeudeul-eun sunjonghadeus ulineun eotteon joe agdo beomhaji anihayeossseubnida lagomalhani cheonsadeul-i geuleohji aniham-ila sillo hananimkkeseoneun neohuiga haeng hayeossdeon modeun geos-eul algo gyesim-ila daedabhadeogla
geuleomeulo jiog-ui mun-eulo deul eoga geugos-eseo yeongsaenghala jeojuga omanhan jadeul-ui geojuji wie iss-eu lila
